name: Spirometry
description: Measures lung function, specifically the volume and speed of air exhaled.

name: Blood culture
description: Detects bacteria or fungi in the blood to diagnose infections.

name: Complete Blood Count
description: Evaluates overall health and detects disorders like anemia or infection.

name: Chest X-ray
description: Images the chest to diagnose lung and heart conditions.

name: Electrocardiogram
description: Records electrical activity of the heart to detect cardiac issues.
